events.name: Blockchain - Opportunities and Challenges
events.description:
This event will cover:
- Current blockchain industry- Blockchain projects’ commercialization challenges- Blockchain industry trends- Finbook’s DUO Network for blockchain applications.
Speaker intro:
Jerry Li, founder of FinBook and DUO Network. He graduated from National University of Singapore with highest distinction in Quantitative Finance. He is an experienced financial engineer looking to bring innovative digital assets to cryptocurrency market. Jerry spent 5+ years in Citibank and SS&C, responsible for the regional hedge fund valuation service. Before Citi, he worked in UBS on equity derivatives structuring and sales.
Finbook has attracted ZhenFund's seed investment in late 2017.
events.location: National University of Singapore, LT26, 21 Lower Kent Ridge Rd, Singapore null

events.name: IBM Z Roadshow in Malaysia
events.description: We are in the midst of a digital transformation that is having a profound effect on us as individuals and across society. Technology disruptions like cloud and cognitive are changing infrastructure requirements at lightning speed. As businesses adapt to capitalize on digital, trust will be the currency that drives this new economy. The IBM® z14™ family of servers is the core of trusted digital experiences. These mainframes offer the ultimate protection for your data while simplifying compliance to new regulations. IBM® z14™ allows you to apply machine learning to your most valuable data to create deeper insights. And IBM® z14™ offers an ideal cloud infrastructure with highly scalable transaction volumes of 100 percent encrypted workloads at low cost. With IBM® z14™ as the foundation of your business you are ready to succeed. We have information packed sessions where IBM experts will discuss why the IBM® z14™ is a completely different modern mainframe platform. Highlights from the agenda includes:- Cloud and Containers- Unlock your applications and data to build new disruptive applications- DevOps and reinvent your platform- IBM Z with blockchain- Trusted platform for the Digital Enterprise https://www.ibm.com/systems/z/
events.location: IBM Client Innovation Center (Room L1MR03), Lingkaran Teknokrat Barat, Cyber 4, Singapore
events.group_name: IBM Z Technical Community in Asia Pacific
